CustomField.formula: IF(OR(Opportunity__r.RecordTypeId =("012600000009X6M"),Opportunity__r.RecordTypeId =("012600000009UrD")), CASE(Opportunity__r.Closing_Month__c, "January", WR__c, "February", WR__c, "March", WR__c, "April", WR__c, "May", WR__c, "June", WR__c, "July", WR__c, 0), 0)
CustomField.label: July
